name: py-openslide-python
description: OpenSlide Python is a Python interface to the OpenSlide library.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: openslide
dependencies.description: OpenSlide reads whole slide image files.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
The Python Imaging Library (PIL) adds image processing capabilities to
your Python interpreter. This library supports many file formats, and
provides powerful image processing and graphics capabilities.
